p: The RRR of salmonellosis under climate change in 2036 was 1.11 compared with the 2004–2013 baseline period. This RRR represents the relative difference between the summed daily RRs for salmonellosis for the daily temperature and rainfall combinations observed in 2004–2013 and the summed daily RRs for salmonellosis for the daily temperature and rainfall combinations projected under climate change in 2036.
